background_blur_hash.description: Contains a very small version of the project background to use as a blurry preview until the actual background is loaded.

background_information.description: Holds extra information about the background set since some background providers require attribution or similar.

created.description: A timestamp when this project was created.

default_bucket_id.description: The ID of the bucket where new tasks without a bucket are added to.

done_bucket_id.description: If tasks are moved to the done bucket, they are marked as done.

hex_color.description: The hex color of this project.

id.description: The unique, numeric id of this project.

is_favorite.description: True if a project is a favorite.

owner.description: The user who created this project.

parent_project_id.description: The ID of the parent project.

position.description: The position this project has when querying all projects.

subscription.description: The subscription status for the user reading this project.

updated.description: A timestamp when this project was last updated.
